price: Dan Allah menyelamatkan orang-orang yang bertakwa karena kemenangan mereka; mereka tiada disentuh oleh azab (neraka dan tidak pula) mereka berduka cita.
arabic: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayunajjī al-lahu alladhīna ittaqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumu al-sūu walā hum yaḥzanūna
